message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is more reasonable.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is a negotiation and we both lose if this drags on. I propose a 50/50 split. This is fair and avoids further losses from inflation.
Considering the inflation, my last offer was generous. I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to end this now.  This is my final offer.
